title: Disk and Washer Method 
date: 04/28/24
author: Sarai Marte
---

<span style=" font-family: var(--primaryFont);">

**1.** Find the volume of the solid generated by revolving y = √x , around the x-axis and bounded by x = 0 and x = 4.

&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;


8pi

&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;

**2.** Find the volume of the solid generated by revolving y = x<sup>3</sup> , around the x-axis and bounded by y = 0 and x = 2.


128pi/7

&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;

**3.**  Find the volume of the solid bounded by the graphs: f(x) = x<sup>2</sup> − 4x + 5, x = 1, and x = 4, and rotated about the x-axis.

&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;

78pi/5

&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;

</span>
